title: Scanning Loop...
body:
My play button won't appear, instead it is constantly scanning at 0% then saying its finished and going back to 0% saying scanning and continues to loop. 
Someone please HELP ME !

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [setting up your permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104) for me, let me know if this helps.
